title: ProStudio: Video maker and editor
description: A web-based video maker and editor that allows users to create and edit videos with various features such as trimming, merging, adding text, filters, and transitions. The application provides an intuitive interface for users to upload their video clips, arrange them on a timeline, and apply different effects to enhance their videos. Users can also export their edited videos in different formats and resolutions.
features: Apply filters and effects to videos
Export videos in various formats and resolutions
author: Sheetal Bajaj
Tech Stack: Canvas API for video editing features
File API for handling video uploads and exports
